node.html:
• Developed and shipped the forecast command to gh valet to enable users to get statistics on their CI provider (Jenkins, AzureDevOps, TravisCI, CircleCI or GitLab) in order to predict potential GitHub Actions consumption and runner requirements.
  • Shipped Kubernetes support for elastic-machines in order to enable customers to more effectively scale their GitHub Actions runners on-demand on the cloud provider of their choice (Azure and/or AWS)
  • Enhanced automated load testing systems to increase reliability and stability elastic-machines releases.

• Developed and shipped mission-critical web app functionality to power battery research and development.
  • Designed and implemented a custom notification system to automate scheduled maintenance of hundreds of tools.
  • Lead the migration effort from a legacy ASP .NET monolith web app to a scalable, containerized, grpc-based backend, with a loosely coupled revamped front-end.
  • Developed dozens of custom web interfaces to enable custom workflows involving barcode scanner interfaces to increase lab operation efficiency.
